description.name: name
description.description: description

description.name: IceStandardViewingGroup
description.description: This group includes all features from a dataset.

description.name: IceNavigationalDisplayMode
description.description: This mode is for Ship Navigators and uses red-yellow-green colors for identification of areas where the ship is allowed to go through.

description.name: IceScientificIceactDisplayMode
description.description: This mode is for ice scientists and uses WMO Color code for display. Display Colors are based on Ice Total Concentration (iceact) attribute.

description.name: IceScientificIcesodDisplayMode
description.description: This mode is for ice scientists and uses WMO Color code for display. Display Colors are based on Ice Stage of Development (icesod) attribute.

description.name: IceUnderLandDisplayPlane
description.description: The Features have to be placed under the land area, if displayed with ENC

description.name: IceStandardDisplayPlane
description.description: All features should be portrayed as overlay on ENC or Single View according to drawing order

description.name: iceclass
description.description: Definition of Ice Class

description.name: encoverlay
description.description: Shows if Ice should be portrayed as ENC overlay

description.name: mainRule
description.description: Main Rules for displaying of ice features.

description.name: seaiceRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of sea ice (seaice) features.

description.name: seaice_class_1ARule
description.description: Rules for displaying of sea ice (seaice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1A.

description.name: seaice_class_1ASRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of sea ice (seaice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1AS.

description.name: seaice_class_1BRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of sea ice (seaice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1B.

description.name: seaice_class_1CRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of sea ice (seaice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1C.

description.name: seaice_class_IIRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of sea ice (seaice) features for Ships of Ice Class II.

description.name: seaice_class_IIIRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of sea ice (seaice) features for Ships of Ice Class III.

description.name: laciceRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of lake ice (lacice) features.

description.name: lacice_class_1ARule
description.description: Rules for displaying of lake ice (lacice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1A.

description.name: lacice_class_1ASRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of lake ice (lacice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1AS.

description.name: lacice_class_1BRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of lake ice (lacice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1B.

description.name: lacice_class_1CRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of lake ice (lacice) features for Ships of Ice Class 1C.

description.name: lacice_class_IIRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of lake ice (lacice) features for Ships of Ice Class II.

description.name: lacice_class_IIIRule
description.description: Rules for displaying of lake ice (lacice) features for Ships of Ice Class III.
